Flow.description: BODEV-4533 Tracing New Pricing Deals Updated the flow to pass "Opportunity with value-based pricing" value to the newly created amendment opportunity.

formulas.name: NotificationEmailBody
formulas.expression: "Hello " & {!Get_Owner_Name.Name}& ", " & "Please be informed that the Sync Process for Quote " & {!Get_Renewal_Quote.QuoteNumber} & " is finished. " & "Best Regards, " & "BizApps Team"

formulas.name: Renewal_OLI_Discount_Amount_QLI
Renewal_OLI_Discount_Amount_RQLI

Flow.label: SF - Sync Renewal Quote

fields.name: ConfirmationMessage
fields.fieldText: The sync process will continue in the background. You will receive a Salesforce Notification once it is complete. Thank you for your patience.

fields.name: ConfrimationMessage
fields.fieldText:
By Syncing this Quote, we assume that all Quote Line Items are finalized and ready to be reflected back to the Original Renewal Opportunity.


In case of Amendments, an Upsell Opportunity will automatically be created and all amended products will be added as Opportunity Products.


The following information will be synced to respective Opportunity ({!Get_Renewal_Opportunity.Name})


Start Date: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Contract_Start_Date__c}

End Date: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Contract_End_Date__c}

Contract Term: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Contract_Term__c}


Invoice Period: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Invoice_Period__c}

Payment Period: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Paymet_Period__c}

P.O Number: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.PO_Number__c}


ARR: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.ARR__c}

One-Off: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.One_off__c}


Discount Amount - ARR: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Discount_Amount_ARR__c}

Discount Amount - One-Off: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Discount_Amount_One_off__c}


Pricing Factors Applied: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Pricing_Factors_Applied__c}


Waive Indexation: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Waive_Indexation__c}


Cap Indexation Rate: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Cap_Indexation_Rate__c}


Applied Cumulative Indexation %: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Applied_Cumulative_Indexation__c} %

Cumulative Indexation Amount: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Cumulative_Indexation_amount__c}

Applied Upcoming Indexation %: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Applied_Upcoming_Indexation__c} %

Upcoming Indexation Amount: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Upcoming_Indexation_amount__c}

Price Uplift on Renewal: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Price_Uplift_On_Renewal__c}

Price Uplift on Renewal %: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Price_Uplift_on_Renewal_percentage__c} %

Renewal Uplift Amount: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Renewal_Uplift_amount__c}



Total Contract value: {!Get_Renewal_Quote.Total_Contract_Value__c}

fields.name: I_want_to_Sync_this_Quote
fields.fieldText: I want to Sync this Quote

fields.name: WarningMessageStatus
fields.fieldText: The Quote you're trying to Sync is Voided, please make sure to sync a Quote that is not voided.

fields.name: WarningMessagePricingFactors
fields.fieldText: Pricing Factors are not yet applied to the Quote you're trying to Sync, please Apply Pricing Factors then try again

fields.name: WarningMessageOpportunityClosed
fields.fieldText: Sync Quote NOT POSSIBLE When The Original Renewal Opportunity is Closed

fields.name: WarningMessageRenewalOpportunityPendingApproval
fields.fieldText: Sync Quote NOT POSSIBLE When The Original Renewal Opportunity is Pending Approval

fields.name: WarningMessageQuotePendingApproval
fields.fieldText: Sync Quote NOT POSSIBLE When The Quote is Pending Approval

fields.name: WarningMessageOppCloseDate
fields.fieldText: Sync Quote NOT POSSIBLE When The Renewal Opportunity Close Date is In The Past
